Sentencas: Highly-efficient solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems are gaining increased attention for future energy conversion applications.
Titulo: Interconnect materials for next-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Many planar SOFC stack designs utilise ferritic stainless steel (FSS) interconnect components.
Titulo: Interconnect materials for next-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: During operation, surface corrosion of FSS interconnects degrades stack operation by increasing electrical resistance and introducing other deleterious material interactions.
Titulo: Interconnect materials for next-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To minimise these effects, various surface modifications and coatings are currently under investigation.
Titulo: Interconnect materials for next-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Two of these methods under development for this application are: metal organic chemical vapour deposition (MO-CVD); and, large area filtered arc deposition (LAFAD).
Titulo: Interconnect materials for next-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SOFC interconnect-relevant corrosion behaviour of an MO-CVD coating on Crofer 22 APU, AL453, Fe30Cr and Haynes230, and complex, amorphous LAFAD AlCrCoMnTiYO coatings on FSS 430 were investigated.
Titulo: Interconnect materials for next-generation solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both of these surface modifications and coatings exhibit significantly improved corrosion protection as compared with uncoated FSS samples.
Titulo: Interconnect materials for next-generation solid oxide fuel cells
